article_title: Valentines Day DNC GOP Dating Site
article_text:
Election 2016

Why This GOP Woman Is #NeverTrump

Katrina Jørgensen has spent years of her life working to promote the Republican Party and conservative causes. But this week, the 30-year-old quit a leadership post in one of the most prominent political organizations for young GOP voters. The reason? Donald Trump

Torey Van Oot

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Lilli Petersen
article_metadata.description: The day before Valentine's Day, the DNC released a new ad and campaign for a fake dating site, gopHarmony, to match you with a Republican candidate.

og.description: Still looking for a Valentine? The Democratic National Committee might have just the match for you, if you're not that into the environment, Obamacare, or women's rights.   The day before Valentine’s, the DNC released a campaign and video advertising a new “dating site” for conservatives
og.title: Match With Your "Perfect" Conservative Valentine On This Faux Dating Site
